title: The Universal Properties of Teichmäuller Spaces
abstract: We discuss universal properties of general Teichmäuller spaces. Our topics include the Teichmäuller metric and the Kobayashi metric, extremality and unique extremality of quasiconformal mappings, biholomorphic maps between Teichmäuller space, earthquakes and Thurston boundary.
